description: Do you know the child helpline?
title: Child hotline information
content:
1. Juliet can start by calling the child helpline on 116
 2. Juliet can report this matter to the nearest police station or the child welfare officer for that area.
 3. She could also report the circumstances under which she is treated to relatives in the village  in order to try and resolve her situation as a family.
 4. Contact the nearest LC official
 5. Contact BarefootLaw on 0414660539
